name: salus
description: Salus is a simple login, signup and account page allowing Google, Facebook, Twitter and Email authentication. It also supports Forgot Password and Change Password functionalities.

scripts.start:dev: cd ./ui && npm run build:dev && cd ../server && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd ./ui && npm install --production=false && npm run build:prod && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
